title: Renovated 1-BR, Union Sq. Somerville, $2000, inc. heat, NO FEE!
posting_body: Available for September 1, this updated one-bedroom unit offers a combination of period detail and modern conveniences.

Located in a National Register historic property on Prospect Hill, this apartment is five minutes from Union Square bus connections and the Green Line, and equally convenient to Harvard, Davis, Porter, Central, Kendall, Lechmere, and Sullivan Squares.
Rent is $2,000 a month and includes heat, gas and hot water.
Asking first month's rent, last month's rent, plus security deposit.
-Large bedroom and living room, kitchen, and bath
-Updated kitchen, with quartz countertops and newer appliances (gas range, built-in microwave, fridge)
-Great, safe neighborhood with restaurants, takeout, specialty shops, grocery, post office, library, Bow Street Market
